law.catch_line: Ownership of trees, shrubs, and plants.
law.text: All trees, shrubs, grasses, and legumes required by this chapter and regulations to be planted or seeded on the area of land affected shall become the property of the landowner, unless the permittee and the landowner agree otherwise.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 429, sec. 15, July 14, 1992. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 14.
